instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Tap the Compose " + " icon . Tap the People icon. Touch the screen and swipe left to Group . Select a group. If no group is listed, you will need to create a group. Tap Done .

From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Tap the Compose " + " icon. Enter the recipient's phone number. To use a stored contact, tap the Contacts icon. Tap the Attach icon. Tap Video . Tap Camcorder . Frame the subject and tap the Camcorder icon to begin recording. Tap the red REC icon to stop recording. Tap the Check mark icon. Tap the Refresh arrow to retake the video. Tap the Send icon.

From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Tap the Compose " + " icon. Enter the recipient's phone number. To use a stored contact, tap the Contacts icon. Tap the Attach icon. Tap Video/Picture . Tap Videos/Pictures . Navigate to and select the desired video/picture. Tap the Send icon.

From any Home screen, tap Contacts . Tap the Groups tab. Select the group you want to send an MMS to. Tap the Menu key. Tap Send message . Select members to add as recipients. If desired, tap Select all . Tap Add . Enter the message for your SMS. Tap Send .

From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap Compose . At 'To,' enter the recipient's phone number. To select from a saved contact, tap the Contact icon. Tap the Enter message field. Enter the text for your MMS. Tap Attach . Tap Take photo or Record video . Frame the subject. Take the picture or record the video. Tap OK . Tap Send .

From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap Compose . At 'To,' enter the recipient's phone number. To select from a saved contact, tap the Contact icon. Tap the Enter message field. Enter message text. Tap Attach . Select Image or Video . Select the picture or video you want to attach. Tap OK . Tap Send .
